text:
The ability to upload more file types in the Design Manager which many of you have been playing with in Sandbox portals is now available in all portals through the local development tooling! Additionally, `.svg` is now supported! Run `npm install -g @HubSpot/cms-cli` to update to the latest version of the CMS CLI to get access.

<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CEQQ9NFK2/p1575303756064500>
hey! In our developer sandboxes, should we be able to create additional blogs?
Yes! Are you running into an issue?

Yep! Imma getting some happy error on attempting to create an additional blog to stage some content

The error modal isn't that helpful: `Error Something went wrong....`

but the console is giving this: `&clienttimeout=14000&casing=snake 409`

earlier on the page load there are these errors:

```VM255:1 GET <https://api.HubSpot.com/gamera/v2/item/blog/user-settings-uid:1004007?portalId=><portal>&clienttimeout=14000 404
(anonymous) @ VM255:1
(anonymous) @ promiseClient.js:95
A @ q.js:482
l @ promiseClient.js:45
o @ q.js:623
(anonymous) @ q.js:648
a.promiseDispatch @ q.js:594
(anonymous) @ q.js:438
u @ q.js:106
s @ q.js:94
l.port1.onmessage @ q.js:153
VM255:1 GET <https://api.HubSpot.com/broadcast/v2/channels?portalId=><portal>&clienttimeout=14000 403```
The 409 indicates a blog already exists at the name given during creation. Let me know if the issue persists and that is not the case!
:faceplam: I'm oblivious. URL conflict from another page. Any chance that error message could be made more specific for a URL conflict?

<@UEZGAHP4H> So sorry I missed this.  I was having a hectic day when you sent this.

I do indeed have a solution for local styling with browser sync, but itâ€™s not too pretty at the moment
